page.title: 11A New Selborne Inhabitant.
page.content: Mr Henderson has lived in Selborne for 7 years. He came to live there because there was a house available only 4 miles from his office, where he is a company director for a firm selling weighbridges. One job before this was as a ship deck officer in the Merchant Navy travelling all over the world. He likes living in Selborne very much because it is a small community. This makes it easy to get to know people and become part of the village quickly. He feels that giving to village life is as important as taking from it but sees that this could be a disadvantage if you don't get on with the people around you. In his job he still travels a lot, around 25,000 miles a year but he likes to come home.His hobbies are golf, steam trains and botany and for this Selborne is a good place to be.
